languages.text: {n}Владайм переводит взгляд на Маражая.{/n} "А вы не брезгуете ничем при выборе наемников. Впрочем, нечистые ксеносы слишком умелы в искусстве резни, чтобы отказываться от их услуг из-за рядовой чистоплотности".

{n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм переводит взгляд на Маражая.{/n} "А вы не брезгуете ничем при выборе наемников. Впрочем, нечистые ксеносы слишком умелы в искусстве резни, чтобы отказываться от их услуг из-за рядовой чистоплотности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unclean xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

{n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unclean xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

{n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unclean xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

{n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unclean xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

{n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

{n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆看着玛拉斋。{/n}“你在选择雇佣兵的时候，还真是一点都不挑剔。不过话说回来，这些邪恶的异形相当擅长屠杀敌人，我可不会因为不值一提的怯懦而拒绝他们的服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆看着玛拉斋。{/n}“你在选择雇佣兵的时候，还真是一点都不挑剔。不过话说回来，这些邪恶的异形实在是太熟练了，我可不会因为不值一提的怯懦而拒绝他们的服务。”

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムはマラズハイを見た。{/n}「傭兵に拘りはないんだな。不浄の異種族は殺戮の術に長けているから、気の迷いなんかでサービスを拒むことはできない」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムはマラズハイを見た。{/n}「傭兵に拘りはないんだな。不浄の異種族は殺戮の術に長けているから、気の迷いなんかでサービスを拒むことはできない」

languages.text: {n}Vladaym mira a Marazhai.{/n} «No eres nada exigente a la hora de elegir mercenarios. Por otra parte, los impíos xenos son demasiado expertos en el arte de la carnicería como para que uno rechace sus servicios».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym mira a Marazhai.{/n} «No eres nada exigente a la hora de elegir mercenarios. Por otra parte, los xenos son demasiado expertos en el arte de la carnicería como para que uno rechace sus servicios».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym blickt zu Marazhai.{/n} "Ihr seid wirklich nicht sehr wählerisch, was die Wahl Eurer Söldner angeht. Andererseits verstehen sich die unheiligen Xenos zu gut auf die Kunst des Metzelns, als dass man ihre Dienste aus trivialer Zimperlichkeit einfach ablehnen könnte."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym blickt zu Marazhai.{/n} "Ihr seid wirklich nicht sehr wählerisch, was die Wahl Eurer Söldner angeht. Andererseits verstehen sich die unsauberen Xenos zu gut auf die Kunst des Metzelns, als dass man ihre Dienste aus trivialer Zimperlichkeit einfach ablehnen könnte."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym se tourne vers Marazhai.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas très {mf|regardant|regardante} en matière de mercenaires, à ce que je vois. Il faut dire que ces xénos impies sont versés dans l'art du carnage, il serait dommage de se passer de leurs services pour une simple histoire de sensiblerie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym se tourne vers Marazhai.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas très {mf|regardant|regardante} en matière de mercenaires, à ce que je vois. Il faut dire que ces répugnants xénos sont versés dans l'art du carnage, il serait dommage de se passer de leurs services pour une simple histoire de sensiblerie. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, gözlerini Marazhai'a dikiyor.{/n} "Görüyorum ki paralı askerlerini seçerken hiç titizlik etmemişsin. Gerçi meşum zenolar katliam işinde epey becerikli olduğundan böyle ufak çekingenlikler sana engel olmamıştır."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym looks over at Marazhai.{/n} "You really aren't picky at all in your choice of mercenaries. Then again, the unholy xenos are too adept in the art of carnage for one to refuse their services out of trivial squeamishness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, gözlerini Marazhai'a dikiyor.{/n} "Görüyorum ki paralı askerlerini seçerken hiç titizlik etmemişsin. Gerçi meşum zenolar katliam işinde epey becerikli olduğundan böyle ufak çekingenlikler sana engel olmamıştır."
